entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump I believe Beijing would agree to take the responsibility of preventing Covid-19 from overly spreading on North America soil, if the states there declared independence from US then joined P.R.C as provinces. Please always remember, you, not any one else, are responsible for US!
